text: Pen kɨli anɨb agɨl, ñɨn olap takaw agɨnɨgabun agɨl aglɨlak. Ñɨn aglɨlak anɨb ak apek, bɨ ned owlak tek mel, kuŋay yɨbɨl Pol yek kal ak owlak. Apɨl, man kɨdeyɨl tɨkak won ak apnan gɨlak. Anɨgɨl apnan gelak, Pol ne God binɨb dɨl kɨlop kod yenɨgab takaw ak agñak. Agñɨlɨg, takaw Mosis tɨkak ak sek, bɨ God gos ñek agñeb ogɨnap tɨkɨlak ak sek, kɨli Jisas anɨb anɨb gɨl gɨnɨgab agɨl tɨkɨlak takaw ak agñak. Jisas nop takaw ak agen nɨgɨlaŋ agɨl, takaw anɨb ak ag mɨdaknɨŋ, sub saŋɨd amnak.
